original_title: Don't Hustle an Ant with Muscle
overview: Whilst hiding out in a house after escaping from being chased by the Aardvark, the Ant discovers a bottle of "Vitamins for Strength"; and after eating a couple of them, becomes ten times stronger than he used to be- much to the Aardvark's displeasure!
title: Don't Hustle an Ant with Muscle
